## HasManyRepository interface

CRUD operations for a target repository of a HasMany relation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HasManyRepository<Target extends Entity> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [create(targetModelData, options)](./repository.hasmanyrepository.create.md) | Create a target model instance |
|  [delete(where, options)](./repository.hasmanyrepository.delete.md) | Delete multiple target model instances |
|  [find(filter, options)](./repository.hasmanyrepository.find.md) | Find target model instance(s) |
|  [patch(dataObject, where, options)](./repository.hasmanyrepository.patch.md) | Patch multiple target model instances |
